== Chowwara (CT) (627974) ==

Chowwara (CT) is a town in the [[Aluva]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 8.27 sq. km. and harbouring 3579 households with total population of 14933 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 25 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 225 km. Male population is 7366 and female population is 7567. Scheduled Caste population is 1859 and Scheduled Tribes population is 31. Census Location Code of the town is 627974<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 20 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 20 km. Railway station is at Chowwara at a distance of 2 km.
